scripts.test: npx kill-port 4444 && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js
scripts.SignupTest: npx kill-port 4444 && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js --spec ./test/specs/signup.e2e.js
scripts.CartTest: npx kill-port 4444 && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js --spec ./test/specs/AddToCart.e2e.js
scripts.PurchaseTest: npx kill-port 4444 && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js --spec ./test/specs/PurchaseProduct.e2e.js
